choose_pairing.title: Select adding method

choose_pairing.MANUAL: Setup devices manually by entering their IP and MAC address

setup_device.title: Setup selected device

device.missing_attributes: Some required paramters are missing (id: __id__, key: __key__, ip: __ip__). Please configure them in the device settings or re-add the device!
device.setting_device_value: Error setting device value for key __key__: __error__
device.no_device: The device (__device__) does not exist or cannot be found.
device.fail_to_connect: Error connecting to device **__device__** Please check if the device is powered on.
device.create_device: Error creating the device some paramters are invalid! (__error__)
